titles.title: A bill to provide temporary suspension of duty on demetallized laminated plastic film and demetallized plastic laminated to paper for use in microwave applications.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/11/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend through December 31, 1990, the duty on demetallized laminated plastic film and demetallized plastic laminated to paper for use in microwave applications.
